long_description: The lightweight, waterproof Mammut Tatoosh jacket keeps you dry and mobile on all sorts of excursions-wear it during fast cold weather ascents, high desert hikes or a quick island rain shower. Durable, yet soft and quiet DRYtech(TM) Premium 2.5-layer nylon shell fabric offers waterproof, windproof and highly breathable protection. Athletic, trim fit, mellow stretch and articulated elbows ensure you're comfortable when you're active. Weighing in at less than a pound, the Mammut Tatoosh packs up small so you can take it everywhere. Adjustable storm hood with reinforced brim cinches down for a close fit providing unhindered peripheral vision. Water-resistant, 2-way pit zippers provide ventilation to help keep your body temperature regulated. Hand and chest pockets feature lightweight, water-resistant zippers. The Mammut Tatoosh jacket has a watertight front zipper with interior storm flap, rip-and-stick adjustable cuff tabs and a drawcord hem.
short_description: The lightweight, waterproof Mammut Tatoosh jacket keeps you dry and mobile on all sorts of excursions-wear it during fast cold weather ascents, high desert hikes or a quick island rain shower.
